await factory.paused();
await factory.unpause();
await factory.pause();
const factory = await ethers.getContractAt("RaffleFactory", "0x12B290Ee2b741f700337680bC781492b7F2BFE37");
await factory.pause();
const factory = await ethers.getContractAt("RaffleFactory", "0x12B290Ee2b741f700337680bC781492b7F2BFE37");
.help
